resources.string: This Application get Football Matches Score for the Premier League,Seria A,Bundesliga,Primera Division and the Uefa Champions League. All Matches data are acquired from football-data.org free API. All team Logos are acquired from http://hdlogo.wordpress.com/ upon requesting permission form the owner. The original version of this app was created by Yahia Khalid Ibn El Walid Ahmed, and a modified version is given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program, this version is updated by Amrendra Kumar. To report any bugs,or suggestions do not hesitate to send a mail to y.k.ibnelwalid@gmail.com.
No football match found for the day.
There seems to be internet connectivity issue.
